TEXT.TITLE: DURAKON <DRKN> PRODUCT SOLD BY CANADIAN TIRE
TEXT.BODY: Durakon Industries Inc said Canadian Tire Corp, the large Canadian auto retailer, has selected Durakon's All Star Liner as its exclusive pickup truck bed liner, to be sold in the 400 Associate Stores across Canada. Reuter
